version_description: Bug fixes
Changes in the message
Minor changes.

A newly re-designed app with enhanced usability and additional features such as:

• Easy ticket-sharing
• Ticketless entry
• Bad Transaction notification with redemption code
• and much more

We've added minor improvements and smashed some small bugs since our last version. The update includes

• Added descriptions for Ratings and Experiences
• Fixed an issue where the app crashes on clicking Majlis experience
• Now, users can easily login by clicking the Profile icon from Menu
• Added universal share URL to support cross platform sharing

Thanks for using Novo Cinemas! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Every update of our app includes improvements for performance and reliability.

Thanks for using Novo Cinemas! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly.

Every update of our app includes improvements for performance and reliability.

• Better customer booking experience
• Single movie listings
• Other fixes

We’ve been listening to your feedback and working hard to improve your Novo Cinemas experience. With all the good points of the earlier version, this one comes with enhanced features.

Here's what's new in this updated version:

• Support for iPhone X

• Venue suggestions based on your location

• General bug-fixes and performance improvements

• F&B pre-orders — What movie is complete without F&B? Book your ticket and choose from a mouthwatering selection of snacks, soft drinks and combos. So, when you do arrive to see your movie, you aren’t standing in line jostling with the crowds.

Novo Cinemas App now includes Novo Premiere Club for users in Qatar. Novo Premiere Club is Novo Cinemas’ exclusive loyalty program where you can earn points on all your transactions and redeem it for free tickets. You can upgrade your registered Novo account to Novo Premiere Club for free through the App by simply logging in, or you can create a new loyalty account through the App.

Loyalty updates:
Create and manage loyalty account for Qatar users
Display loyalty account QR code for scanning at box office and concessions counters to earn points
Redeem points for free tickets
Redeem special loyalty offers

Other updates:
Overall performance improvement

Hello movie goers!

We’ve been listening to your feedback and made some performance enhancements to improve usability in this update.

We’d love to hear from you. If you enjoy using the app, leave us a rating and review.

See you at Novo!
